description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Participation' that renders a list of participation items within a styled card component. It imports React, a custom CyberCard component, a utility function getIcon, and some styles, then displays participation details such as title, organization, year, and additional details.

methods.name: Participation({ items = [] })
methods.description: React functional component that renders participation items inside a CyberCard component.
